column4: I'm looking for a package with wich I can read keycodes for volume keys .. , I know there is /was one in debian but I  can't even find it there is keycodes the wrong expression to look for ?
do you need to know the key codes? you can set shortcuts in gnome without knowing them
did you add splashimage to grub
isn't grub splashimage a different thing? I do have that
